txt.en: Standing in the small patch of sweet-smelling flowers, you feel refreshed and, for a moment, at peace. Could there be other such blossoms here in the Marsh?\n\nSearch for other patches of the flowers in the Dead Marshes.

Standing in the small patch of sweet-smelling flowers, you feel refreshed and, for a moment, at peace. Could there be other such blossoms here in the Marsh?\n\nSearch for other patches of the flowers in the Dead Marshes.
A tender patch of flowers proves there is hope even in the depths of this marsh.
You have discovered all the flower blossoms in the Dead Marshes.
You have discovered all the flower blossoms in the Dead Marshes.
